name: HuggingFaceH4/ultrachat_200k
description: UltraChat 200k is a 200,000-dialogue dataset, derived from the UltraChat dataset, which was generated by ChatGPT. This filtered version was instrumental in the training of Zephyr-7B-β, a state-of-the-art 7-billion parameter chat model. The dataset underwent a selection process and truecasing to create a focused resource for faster supervised fine-tuning, making it a valuable tool for researchers and developers working on large-scale dialogue data.
citeAs: @misc{ding2023enhancing,       title={Enhancing Chat Language Models by Scaling High-quality Instructional Conversations},        author={Ning Ding and Yulin Chen and Bokai Xu and Yujia Qin and Zhi Zheng and Shengding Hu and Zhiyuan Liu and Maosong Sun and Bowen Zhou},       year={2023},       eprint={2305.14233},       archivePrefix={arXiv},       primaryClass={cs.CL} }
creator: HuggingFaceH4
keywords: Chat Models Training, UltraChat Dataset, Large-scale Dialogue Data
